title: Australian diary. No. 048
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: The following items are featured on this interesting cinemagazine: youngsters from the outback enjoy an ideal holiday; imitation that is intended to flatter; New Zealand trade delegation on Jubilee visit; early training for budding “Jack Tars” and plastic invades fields of ancient Aboriginal art.
